title: sap.fe.macros.field.Field
content:
# sap.fe.macros.field.Field

Building block for creating a field based on the metadata provided by OData V4.
Usually, a DataField or DataPoint annotation is expected, but the field can also be used to display a property from the entity type. When creating a Field building block, you must provide an ID to ensure everything works correctly.
Usage example: 

sap.ui.require(["sap/fe/macros/field/Field"], function(Field) {
	 ...
	 new Field("MyField", {metaPath:"MyProperty"})
})

This is currently an experimental API because the structure of the generated content will change to come closer to the Field that you get out of templates. The public method and property will not change but the internal structure will so be careful on your usage.

**Type:** class **Module:** sap/fe/macros/field/Field ## Methods ### addMessage

Adds a message to the field.

### getEnabled

Gets the current enablement state of the field.

### getValue

Retrieves the current value of the field.

### removeMessage

Removes a message from the field.

### setEnabled

Sets the current enablement state of the field.

### setValue

Sets the current value of the field.
